backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing contact form entries with validation and retrieval via list operations.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing features, related files, components, and confidence for build/deployment tasks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to human‑written summaries of component purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps for building and publishing the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root div and script loading the Vite/React main entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders them within the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/BookFreeConsulta: CTA component offering WhatsApp, phone, and contact form actions in default or compact variants.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component with field validation, success/error states, and backend mutation for submitting contact messages.
frontend/src/components/home/GovernmentS: Displays subsidy benefit highlights with cards and a detailed breakdown table of central and state solar subsidies.
Provides an auto-rotating hero banner slider with images, promotional text, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFooterC: Shows a footer call‑to‑action section with contact info, quick actions, and a consultation form.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeSolarCa: Renders a solar savings calculator with monthly bill input and displays computed system details. Uses helper functions to calculate system size and show results alongside a link to book a site survey.
frontend/src/components/home/HowSolarWor: Displays a visual explanation of how solar systems work using an infographic and step-by-step icons. Includes Hindi descriptions and a detailed text explanation.
frontend/src/components/home/OurSolarSer: Lists various solar service offerings in a grid of cards, each with an icon, title, and description. Provides an overview of residential, commercial, and specialized solar solutions.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseTr: Shows trust factors for choosing the company, using cards highlighting certifications, quality, EPC services, and support. Emphasizes reliability and customer assurance.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, services list, and contact details including a fallback logo handler.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with logo handling, navigation links, mobile menu, and consultation contact dropdowns.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout wrapping content with a header and footer.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines a Project interface and exports an array of sample solar installation projects. Each entry includes location, capacity, image, and key benefits.
frontend/src/data/serviceDetails.ts: Exports detailed service descriptions for multiple solar system types including features, benefits, and target users. Provides SEO fields and long-form content for each service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication using React Query. Automatically refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/assets.ts: Utility functions to generate production-safe URLs for static and generated assets respecting base paths.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports shared branding constants including application name, logo path, and tagline.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides helpers to set page title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar system calculation logic, subsidies, formatting helpers, and related constants.
frontend/src/lib/solarKwImages.ts: Maps solar system sizes to representative image paths with fallback handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app by mounting providers and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, vision, and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Renders an interactive solar calculator page that computes solar system sizing and savings with dynamic images and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with SEO setup, hero section, company contact details, and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with SEO setup and multiple feature sections including hero slider, subsidy info, services, and calculator.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Shows how solar energy works with SEO setup, a hero section, infographic, process steps, and benefits.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Presents the projects portfolio with SEO setup, stats, and a gallery of completed solar installations.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Loads a specific service by slug, sets SEO, and displays its overview, features, benefits, and related details.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all available solar services with SEO setup, icons, descriptions, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SubsidiesPage.tsx: React page displaying government solar subsidy information with SEO setup and styled sections using cards and tables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with added plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, deployment issues, and pending feature requests related to fixing build failures and publishing the site.
